name: Perfect Strike Bowling
description:
Perfect Strike Bowling is one of the most addictive, 3D bowling and shuffleboard games. Perfect Strike Bowling is Bowl more Strikes and become the bowling Champion.

Perfect Strike Bowling is the only bowling game that fully embraces the incredible 3D physics engine and effects.
You can play with feeling as if they really throw by accustomed.
Perfect strike bowling is fantastic game, Bowling has never been so fun!

GAME MODES:

- Simple:
Simply shoot the ball & make best score.

- Don't Miss Challenge:
Randomly generated swing option has been added to make the game more interesting. Think before throwing of ball and setting a direction of ball.

How to Play:

Swipe upward to throw the ball and knock down the pins.
Swipe across the screen to add spin to the ball.


Share with your friends & family and compete your HighScore with them...
